original_text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory, much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory.
korean_text: 정죄의 직분도 영광이 있은즉 의의 직분은 영광이 더욱 넘치리라

sentences.original_text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory
much more doth the ministration of righteousness
